InsertSupplierProgressHis.Sql: insert into uic_supplier_progress_his (purid,lineid,isnew,stateno,statename,remark,recordocode,recordtype,recordtime,hisid,attids) select purid,lineid,case when recordtype='0' then supplyisnew else groupisnew end,case when recordtype='0' then supplystateno else groupstateno end ,case when recordtype='0' then supplystatename else groupstatename end,case when recordtype='0' then supplyremark else groupremark end ,case when recordtype='0' then supplyrecordocode else grouprecordocode end ,recordtype,case when recordtype='0' then supplyrecordtime else grouprecordtime end ,@hisid,attids from uic_supplier_progress where purid=@purid and lineid=@lineid
